Design Communication and Testing Strategy: B Campaign Building

This module engages students in the iteration and refinement of their campaign prototyping and testing strategies, emphasising their importance in the design process. Students will repeatedly realise their improving designs to better align them with end-user needs and stakeholder expectations. A central part of the module is understanding and executing social media marketing campaigns. Students will learn to deliver a cohesive brand vision, strategy, and identity, that translates these into compelling narratives across various social platforms.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Investigate the relationship between design, audience, and stakeholders in communication design.

+  Utilise typography and audio-visual presentation skills to optimize message transmission.

+  Explore the use of prototyping and testing strategies to refine design processes.

+  Execute and assess social media marketing campaigns following strategic principles.
